sentence.text: We also demonstrate that tumor-associated transcription by RNA polymerase IIs induce the expression of genes associated with an aggressive phenotype in primary lung cancer cells and selectively promote their dissemination rather than local growth.
We show that the tumor microenvironment modulates transcription by RNA polymerase II gene expression and identify a four-gene MSC signature that is functionally implicated in promoting metastasis.

Here, we assessed the effect of paired tumor-associated and normal lung tissue mesenchymal stem cells (transcription by RNA polymerase IIs) on the growth and dissemination of primary human lung carcinoma cells isolated from the same patients.
